website_summaries.verdict: Highly readable, reliable and luxurious ladies' Seiko two-tone gold and silver stainless steel watch. Features solar technology.
pros: Great watch for all occasions with durable build and innovative solar powered movement
cons: Removing links to adjust sizing is best done by professionals

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The order came in a timely manner. The watch is what I expected and is easy to put on because of the latch on the watch. I did have to take it to a jeweler to have a couple of links removed. I love the numbers and it has the day and and date which comes in handy. It’s easy to change the day and date, just read the information on it. The face of the watch isn’t so big for my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Fix the user's manual and the mechanism holding the crown in the watch, is my advice
customer_reviews.text: This watch has a very bad section in the user's manual - the section on setting the date. It mentions pulling the crown out to the second stop to set the date and it's very ambiguous and indecipherable. While trying to set the date by pulling the crown out to the second stop, the crown pulled (completely) out of the watch. Note: I am not Hercules or Superman. At this point, when the crown was inserted back into the watch, it wouldn't stay in the watch. Other than that, it's a great watch! But I returned it because we wanted one that allows for the date and time to be set.
customer_reviews.author: Christian C. Kunig

customer_reviews.title: The watch was great until it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: I received the watch 8/16/17. I bought it because I loved my previous Seiko watch. Not happy with the date setting but it wasn't a deal breaker. Otherwise, the watch was great, until it wasn't. Four months and it stopped. I assume because it is winter and the watch is solar deprived. Not so happy with my summer watch.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Go solar, maybe that'll do away with short life batteries
customer_reviews.text: My bridegroom of 36 years, got tired of batteries died so early. Hopefully the solar will solve that problem for us. She loves the white background with the dark letters. When you get in your senior years. It gets a little harder to see things. My bride is one happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Green

customer_reviews.title: Needs Sun to Work
customer_reviews.text: Like everything else "solar", the watch needs sun to work. Since I live in a cold climate, I wear long sleeves frequently. Therefore, not of much use to me. Returned the watch for repairs after 4 months. Worked well this summer and now, if it is not stopped completely, it is losing time. Waste of money. You can buy several cheap watches for the price you pay for this one, and overall the cheaper ones will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B. Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Every Day Watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice every day, casual watch. The two tone goes with everything and there’s no glitz. This has easy to read numbers, a second hand and a date box. You do have to move it ahead after short months. It comes with a lot of links. If you have a small wrist, you need to get some removed. The links are only about 1⁄2 inch, which allows for good sizing. Keeping it charged is easy. I worried that I might have to keep resetting it, but just leaving it under a lamp for a few hours every day seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: LabLady

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, never have to buy a watch battery again.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Pendley

customer_reviews.title: Calendar is a pain to keep up with ....
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift from my husband. I don't wear a watch everyday but this one seems to keep the time accurately even with occasional wearing. The thing that I don't like about it is that the calendar portion is on a 31 day time frame. If the month does not have 31 days in it, you must manually make a change to the calendar to get the accurate date setting on it.
customer_reviews.author: DDay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read dial for aging eyes.
customer_reviews.text: My last Seiko was slightly smaller - no numbers or date. Very petite. Loved it. After 40 years and much abuse from everyday living it died. Ah, but I am older and the eyes work well for a 71 year old. But a little larger would be nice since I keep getting older - Hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm. Anyway, with covid hanging around and being mind full and busy I do loose track of the days. They all run together. The date is a great feature. Seiko was good to me once, so therefore I expect it to be great again and last the remainder of my days, even if I do make it to 100.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda W. Wooton

customer_reviews.title: Highly Functional Watch
customer_reviews.text: Received promptly and undamaged. My family had bought me a watch just like this brand and I really like it. (no winding and almost automatic) so I got this watch for my wife this Christmas as a gift. She really likes the open face with the numbers which is easier for her to read. She has trouble seeing the smaller faced watch she has w/o numbers. This one is both stylish and functional for her. the only con is that it does not light up in the dark otherwise she really likes it and appreciates the gift. We have to take it in to remove a couple of links but other than that all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Slicktek50

customer_reviews.title: Special tools needed to adjust the band.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking. Easy to read. Day and date. Keeps good time. Why not a 5 star review? I needed a jeweler to adjust the band. It was either that, or buy a special tool. And why does the manufacturer claim it is water resistant to 99 feet, and then state: "withstands rain and splashes of water but not showering or submersion". WHICH IS IT???? It cannot be both. Perhaps they don't understand that water resistant to 99 feet does mean that it can be BRIEFLY SUBMERSED (not to swim, but a quick dunk shouldn't be a problem). Also, a light up dial would be a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Customer LJJ

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: Saw this with a greatly reduced price and finally bought my July birthday present in February. I've had Seiko watches before and really like them. This one should be even better because the numbers are easy to read and it's solar powered. I opened the box, set the time and laid it on the table under the light. It started working right away. I only had to reset the day and date for March. I still need to have a couple of links removed which surprised me since my wrist isn't small.
customer_reviews.author: bellringer84

customer_reviews.title: The face is easy to read
customer_reviews.text: The face is easy to read. The band sucks. It is thin and has a long clasp in the back that when fastened sticks out through the band on the inside of my wrist. It is cheaply made compared to my other Seikos.
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I love Seiko watches have had them for years. My old faithful watch was showing signs of aging and hard use so selected this one. Figured in Florida we would have enough sun to keep it charged. It is a little larger than I expected but so much easier to read the date and time. Have had this for a while now and has been in and out of water and still keeps great time. I would definitely buy again but honestly if this one lasts like my last one did won't have to.
customer_reviews.author: Islandgal

customer_reviews.title: The hook clasp in the band is too difficult to release.  Too small face.
customer_reviews.text: The hook clasp in the band is too difficult to release. I would not spend extra time struggling on releasing the wrist watch. Seiko failed on designing this watch. Terribly cumbersome. The face of this watch is as small as a quarter. It should be as large as men's watch (1 inch diameter) to be practical. The manufacturers are making women's items unpractical in every which way. They make women's pants without pockets. The watch makers create stupid watches like this. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: A hiker

customer_reviews.title: watch broke after few months!
customer_reviews.text: It took me 2 tries of sending the watch back to the Seiko office to get links added (with cost and postage each time). Then when I finally got it back, it worked well for a few months and then quit. I don't know if I'll even bother to send it back (it's supposedly still under warranty) or not! It never had good instructions for the particular model, and the people at SEIKO weren't particularly helpful. My husband got a SEIKO watch several years ago and it works just fine. His has a regular replaceable battery, while mine was solar. Wish I had gotten one like his!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Many reasons to love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped wearing a watch several years ago, when the battery died on an old, beat up, Pulsar. I could not find another watch that I liked, that wasn't over $300. This had everything I wanted: Analog watch, Link band, Day/Date that is big enough to read, and it came with an unexpected extra...it is solar powered! That was a pleasant surprise. And the price was even better, listed as regular price $215, but on sale below $200. WOW! It was worth waiting for the right watch.
customer_reviews.author: sek

customer_reviews.title: This watch is simply great if you like the classic style
customer_reviews.text: This watch is simply great if you like the classic style.. I've been looking for a watch for more than 2 years, believe me !!! I am picky and I have a small wrist.. I tried many luxury brands, Rado, Tissot, Michael Kors, and.. but finally decided to get a cheaper one when those expensive ones don't meet my taste !!! but I really loved this one.. it's perfect for my wrist, it's so light, not heavy at all.. great for daily use. not at all a cheap view and so classy :) strongly recommended finally after 2 years :)
customer_reviews.author: AZAR

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is one great deal! This watch is easy to read, looks great and goes well with any style! I’ve been wearing mine all day since I ordered it from Amazon. It’s definitely gotten wet while cleaning up the kitchen and pretreating laundry. It still runs as well as the day it came. A local jewelry store has the same watch for twice the price. I’m so glad I treated myself to this great little watch!
customer_reviews.author: Lucian S.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This watch lasted 6 months, then died. I thought that maybe it had not been exposed to enough light, so I laid it under a light for 3 days, but nothing. Continued to let it lay under a light for 2 weeks. Still nothing. I would not recommend this watch, nor would I buy another.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Seiko has always made a good product. This one seems to be of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Seiko has always made a good product. This one seems to be of the quality you'd expect. Replaced my mother's old one because the battery had died and cost $25+ to replace with no jeweler in the area to do it and she wanted a numbered dial for easy reading. Only possible drawback is the "solar" power, as she's in a nursing home and is not in direct sunlight that often. Also, I wish Seiko would include instructions on how to adjust the wrist band length. Had to go on you-tube. No biggy
customer_reviews.author: William J Sexton Jr

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to set
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive watch, but really difficult to set. At first I thought, well, okay, I could just set it and it and be done with it. If you want to use the day/date setting this will require resetting for each month that does not have 31 days. If you ignore the day/date feature you will be fine, but why pay extra for a feature that will not be used.
customer_reviews.author: CT Gal

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOLAR WATCH
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch - I like the 2-tone look of gold & silver so it goes with all my jewelry. I had to take it to the jewelers to have 5 links removed but that was no big deal. The watch is very attractive and so far it keeps good time. I also thought that the price was very competitive. I'm very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: muffet

customer_reviews.title: This watch worked great until approx 2 weeks prior to the one year ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch worked great until approx 2 weeks prior to the one year anniversary. Watch started losing time. Time lost increasing as time passes and now watch just completely stops. Totally unacceptable for a Seiko product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check watch placement before sizing band
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very pretty. It did take 9 hours in full sun to charge fully the first time. More expensive models charge quicker. Also, after I had links removed from the band, it did not sit at the center of my wrist because of the clasp mechanism. I had several links moved from one side to the other to make it work. Luckily the jeweler didn't charge me any more than the original $10 I paid. My suggestion is to check the placement on the wrist before adjusting the band.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this watch as a gift for my grandmother. The numbers are easy to read, the watch doesn't have any highly technical functions and is great for an older person or anyone who wants a no fuss product. It's solar so it never needs a battery. Also, the price came in almost $40 cheaper than my local jewelry store offered the exact same product.
customer_reviews.author: regionalGirl137

customer_reviews.title: Update. After not even 2 years of no everyday ...
customer_reviews.text: Update.After not even 2 years of no everyday usage watch broke.just stopped working.I'm upsad because it was gift for my mom.she didn't get to wear it for to long:((
customer_reviews.author: E.S

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for - simple, yet more dressy than my Timex underwater watch with the rubber-type black band. Is keeping very good time. The day and date are a bit hard for me to read with glasses on, but can take off and see it, and like having it. You can even select the day to be displayed in Spanish or French, if you don't want English. The band was rather large, so I took to a local jeweler, who removed 4 links - about $11. I love the fact that I don't have to wind or replace a battery! Price seemed very reasonable too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lyter

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this watch for Christmas, and I love, love, love it!! It’s easy to read and keeps perfect time when comparing it with the time on my iPhone. Classy, plus it being silver and gold makes it go with any jewelry. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Taebaker

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a maintenance free watch KEEP LOOKING!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this Solar rechargeable watch for my wife with the hopes that I wouldn't have to deal with the periodic battery replacements required of her other watches. I was sadly disappointed to find that I'm still having to replace the battery periodically and the replacement battery is TEN times the cost of the lithium batteries in our other watches!
customer_reviews.author: D. Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just had several links removed today and am now wearing it. ($8) I am slightly disappointed in it as I thought the gold part of the links would be raised a little instead of being perfectly flat, the gold ring around the face is a little heavy and, as expected, the day and date are very difficult to read. The watch is nice looking though and I like the way the links are attached to the watch body. I found it easy to set, especially when I read the instructions.😊 Price was very good for a Seiko.
customer_reviews.author: booknut

customer_reviews.title: Watch band needs to come in a longer size too instead of just one size!
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it is too small for my wrist. I will try taking it in to a nearby jeweler and see if they can order extra links and put them in. Right now it's about a half an inch too small. When I tried to call Seiko's number for North America myself, I was put on hold for a VERY long time until I just finally hung up! That was not a good experience!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Three Times a Charm!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, after my third purchase and two returns I found the best watch. I"m so happy with the 2 tone colors, easy to read numbers without my glasses, no more batteries or watch band replacement. I had 6 links taken out of the band at a pawn shop for $5, can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Debcatz

customer_reviews.title: Normal size watch face, easy to read numbers
customer_reviews.text: I love Seiko watches and have owned one for several years. I am getting a little older and would like to be able to easily see the time on the face of the watch. While the black numbers on the face are easy to read, the face is the same diameter of a normal watchface. I had ordered this watch on the belief that the watch face was a bit larger than normal, but not the case. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: A Price

customer_reviews.title: Solar Charge before setting time/day/date
customer_reviews.text: Functional beauty for a solar charge watch. Make sure to read the instructions about fully charging the watch by sunlight or room light before setting up the time/day/date. Also, the band was quite large for me so I needed to see a jeweler to remove enough links to fit my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: This watch keeps time well
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to do the first solar charge for this watch but once that was done it has worked well. I do charge it at night under a lamp while I'm watching TV and that seems to work. Otherwise I've not had any problems with the watch. I hope that it will last for years as some of the reviews have stated.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Seiko after a careful reading of comments. Even though I've only had it a short time, it has kept good time, is a handsome watch, easy to read. My only concern is the fact I had to have so many links removed to make it fit my wriest. If I find I have problems with it down the road, will comment again.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: ) of the watch I loved and lost
customer_reviews.text: This was an exact duplicate (?) of the watch I loved and lost. First, the band was so small that I couldn't fit it on my wrist. I had to spend $20 for new links. Then, when I finally got to a jeweler to put the links in and decided to wear it, it wouldn't charge. I have spent $120+ on something that is not usable.
customer_reviews.author: citrusrat

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: No longer have to worry about batteries. I have been wearing it since Christmas after charging it for several hours in the sunlight. I don't make a habit of making sure it is int the sun or under a light and so far it is keeping great time. Read the directions for setting it very carefully and follow them and all will be great!
customer_reviews.author: altacall

customer_reviews.title: Like Seiko Watches...Not Fond of This Model
customer_reviews.text: The reason I don't like this model is because of the difficulty changing the day and date. Pull the stem out one click, turn clockwise for the day then push stem back in. Pull the stem out one click again, turn counter-clockwise to change the date. There also is another language in the days that I don't recognize. The fact that it changes the day or time after passing every "12" prompts me to have to correct the day and date again. Disappointed in this model and would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: The watch can not be worn in the shower! As per the manufacturer. Nothing near water!
customer_reviews.text: The watch was good value, attractive, easy to read. Except it said it is water resistant to 100 feet! When we received the watch and read the literature it said you could not even shower with the watch on. What happened to water resistant to 100 feet. We wanted some thing that could survive in water. We returned the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Wife is very particular about the size of her watches. I bought this to replace her Citizen that she has worn for 12 years. It's capacitor will no longer store energy. So far so good. She likes the look and feel of it and at 1/2 the price I like it too. Good value watch. Only time will tell. Pun intended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and wearable
customer_reviews.text: This solar watch solves both my problems: I no longer need to replace the watchband and no longer need to replace the battery. I haven't owned it long enough to judge the accuracy, but for the two weeks I've been wearing it (after having some links removed to resize the band), it's been keeping time well. I like the fact that it combines the silver and gold colors and thus will "go with" anything I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solar keeping good time...pretty watch.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch...bought Oct 2017. Ordered band adjuster kit as I wear my Seiko more as a bracelet/had few links removed. Date window a little small but ok...it's a ladies watch. Solar working well. My last Seiko lasted 25 years! So far so good...my first solar.
customer_reviews.author: Suzzie H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: My wife was absolutely delighted with the watch. Neither of us realised the the watch was "solar" powered, when we ordered, so that was just a bonus. Delivery was 4 days ahead of schedule, and the package was in perfect condition. Great buy and great service, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: mike noosa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice watch, but I have had two problems with it. First of all, the band will not stay latched. Secondly, it has stopped running and the booklet tells me to put it in the sun for solar recharge and it has been in the sun for weeks without any help. I need to return it for repair or replace.
customer_reviews.author: Nita Mills

customer_reviews.title: Always Seiko
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! I always buy seiko, very dependable. My last one was at least 20 yrs old & stopped. So instead of messing with batteries I went solar. Love it. Easy to read,great second hand plus easy to read day & date.
customer_reviews.author: L.Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Simple but delicate
customer_reviews.text: This watch combine everything in a sigle item. Technology, elegance and simplicity. I believe this will be the last watch I will buy to my wife. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unreliable(would stop and start) and then failed completely not long after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in a year, rude representative, deleted review. regret bought it.
customer_reviews.text: My last detailed review wasn't going alive, maybe it has been deleted by Amazon. I am depleted writing a lot. So summarize as: Stop working in a year without any shocking or liquid, rude representative, deleted review. regret bought it. You will never imaging how long and how much you will waste on this less than $100 watch.
customer_reviews.author: stella

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to follow the instructions to get the
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to follow the instructions to get the watch started properly. Also easy to remove links to fit my wife's wrist. After that all we needed to do was admire Seiko's quality working. One other plus, the face is white and has larger numerals so it is easier for the elderly to see the time.
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: It is a very beautiful everyday watch
customer_reviews.text: It is a very beautiful everyday watch. Dial is easy to read for my older eyes. Watch itself is a little thicker than I expected, still comfortable to wear. Wish if it came with a short instruction on how to shorten the strap including a pin tool to use for shortening. It was not easy to find a strong enough pin to fit in the small strap holes to shorten it. Once I got the right size pin, it was easy to do without any special device.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch and Band - Tiny Day/Date Display
customer_reviews.text: The watch and band are beautiful. The numbers and hands are very easy to read. Another great feature is that it is "solar", recharging itself on available light so there is no conventional battery to replace. However, the day and date display are quite small. My wife had trouble reading something so small. Since the day and date feature was a major driver for the purchase, we ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stetson II

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, bought it for my mom's birthday. Easy to read. Was surprised that it came with all the tags including the Seiko warranty, because I've bought 2 Seiko watches & none have come with it
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size for a woman's wrist, and good looking, as well!
customer_reviews.text: We love that it's solar powered, not needing any battery replacement. Silver & gold accents go with any wardrobe choice, and the dial is easily readable. Love this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Peter L. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday watch!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 5 or 6 similar Seiko watches and they have all been great! I particularly love this one for its more feminine face design and, of course, reliable water-resistance. The solar charging is a huge bonus! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Geekyblonde

customer_reviews.title: I like the look and the feel of this watch
customer_reviews.text: I can't find the seller on here. I received my watch and have had it both under a lamp and in the sun. It has yet to charge. I like the look and the feel of this watch, but Im pretty disappointed. And if it won't charge within the next day, I'm returning and writing a bad review.
customer_reviews.author: BamasLuLu

customer_reviews.title: Attractive watch with large readable numbers
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this watch for a week or so, but I like it. It is pretty, easy to read and never needs a battery replacement. It is solar powered. I had to have links taken out to make it small enough for me and a local jeweler did this for $10 with no problems. I hope to enjoy this watch for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: DET

customer_reviews.title: a Great watch at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: When my Seiko watch that I have had for over 30 years finally died, I told my husband I would like a watch just like my old one, never thinking I would find one. Well I did find one exactly like my old watch only my new watch is solar powered (added bonus!) Thanks, Seiko, for continuing to offer a classicly designed watch and to Amazon for making the purchase so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Harrower

customer_reviews.title: Small & attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but a little on the small side. I'd say the dial is as big as a dime and I prefer the size of a quarter. I wear it anyway cuz it's attractive, functions well, & I love it has day & date
customer_reviews.author: Margie Gordillo

customer_reviews.title: This watch is beautiful! My old seiko is 30 years old and ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful! My old seiko is 30 years old and is still running although I need a new band for it. I hope this watch lasts just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Lana J. Fraley

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Like others who have reviewed this watch, I had had mine for about a year and a half when it stopped working. My jeweler suggested leaving it in the sun. Still doesn't work. Given other folks' experience with the warranty, I will simply buy another watch of another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Seiko Watch
customer_reviews.text: I owned a Seiko watch that I lost. I thought this was just like the one I had previously. As a result I was unhappy with it, but I needed a watch. This will do until I can find one that was more feminine looking than this one is. It works just fine. It's just not my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working, too expensive to repair!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this solar watch so I could avoid having to replace batteries. Had to pay jeweler $10 to adjust band. Very difficult to see or adjust time, day, date settings. Battery quit charging right after warranty expired. Tried all the hints online to make it work. Contacted Seiko re repairs. Service charge is $116, plus postage, plus any other extras determined to be needed, plus extra to ship to Japan, then wait 5-8 weeks! More than I paid for the watch! Really disappointed. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and sophisticated timepiece that remains accurate. Excellent price
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Am I able to replace this watch for one that is not a solar watch?
customer_reviews.text: It keeps stopping on me even after making sure it is in the sunlight. Wish I could return it. It is a lovely watch but does not work properly..
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. It is beautiful!! I haven’t worn it yet because I have a very small wrist and I do have to have a couple links taken out. I’ll let you know more later! 👍🏻😉
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: I usually have a terrible time finding something where the watch band is big ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness, the band is big enough! I usually have a terrible time finding something where the watch band is big enough and not elastic. It is small and lady-like and attractive. I think I'm going to like it. Wish it had a button for looking at it in the dark, but it doesn't, so in the middle of the night if I wake, I have to turn on the lamp to see what time it is. My choice was big enough band or night light. It's a pretty watch.
customer_reviews.author: AlaskaDolly

customer_reviews.title: I love the watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch! It is the right size and I can read the dial without glasses. I had to take it to a jeweler to have the band sized but other than that, no complaints yet. The description on the site is misleading - under special features t says light - to me that means it has a light not that it is LIGHT WEIGHT. I would suggest that they change the wording.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: but had to go to a jeweler to get some links removed from the band and it now it fits great.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my Mother for her birthday and she loves it, but had to go to a jeweler to get some links removed from the band and it now it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Great product . my wife loves it and is happy she can read the day and date. Other watches are very hard to read because of small characters but not this one. Love the solar power feature too.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this watch. It is really stunning. The pictures do not do it justice. It is nice not to have to worry about batteries. Plus, it keeps really good time. She has been wearing it for about 6 months now and has yet to see any signs of wear. Still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: wberndt

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I don't like watch faces with little lines instead of numbers. The numbers make it very easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Had this watch before. It lasted 30 years. Needed to be replaced. Expect to get 30 out of this one. Light weight, beautiful and just right for me. Was $250 at local mall last Christmas. Good bargin.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Hart

customer_reviews.title: Standard bearer for non Swiss watches
customer_reviews.text: Really can't beat Seiko. I have over 40 watches, inc. terribly high priced Swiss ones and also have and give Seikos as gifts. Lotsa 'bang for the buck' and my Mother in law LOVED this one!
customer_reviews.author: RobAngel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality& Price
customer_reviews.text: It was a pleasant surprise that Seiko quality is the same or better than it was 40 years ago. I bought this watch for my wife as a "vacation watch" as she didn't want to take her Rolex on vacation to the Islands. It looked great & if lost or stolen, no big loss.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely NOT buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as a birthday gift--her Rolex needs repair and this is a good substitute--and she loves it! Keeps exact time and mimics the look of her Rolex. EDIT 01/16/18 Watch still looks great after almost six months, but I don't think it should be losing an hour a day! Five star rating went to one star because of this. Poor quality do not buy this POS.
customer_reviews.author: Fl_Beachcomber

customer_reviews.title: Seiko SUT116
customer_reviews.text: This watch was purchased as a Christmas present for my wife. She likes it very much; however, she hasn't been able to have our Jeweler adjust the band for her. Regardless, the watch is a nice looking item and the Seiko reputation speaks for itself. We have no doubts that it will serve my wife very well for many years. Thank you for asking for my opinion. Sincerely, CLW
customer_reviews.author: CLW

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch. Easy to set. I’m taking it to the jeweler today to take out about 5 links so it fits snugger. The way it closes is very secure. The white face makes it easy to read. The band is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to get set correctly.  Removed back to check battery, and wound up breaking crystal
customer_reviews.text: Looked at Youtube examples, could nor get it to "Set". Removed back to check the battery, and wound up breaking the crystal. Can YOU find a jeweler who will help if you didn't buy it from him? Forget it.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch for multiple occassions
customer_reviews.text: Watch is nice and goes with everything. Band is rather large. I had to take several links out. There were no instructions on how to remove links but I found the answer on You Tube.
customer_reviews.author: froggermom

customer_reviews.title: A great gift anytime!
customer_reviews.text: Great item. My wife loves it. Easy to read face. Solar charging means no winding or battery replacement. Day and date is easy to see. It gains just under 2 seconds a week when tested against an atomic clock. Watch band is easy to resize correctly with the right set of cheap watch tools available at Amazon for about eight bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Russian Judge

customer_reviews.title: Buy from a reputable jeweler.
customer_reviews.text: Clasp broke after only two months. Cannot buy a replacement band. Will have to try to get it fixed by Seico, but it’s a hassle I don’t need right now. Watch has kept good time.
customer_reviews.author: Batya Weisskoff

customer_reviews.title: LOST ONE HOUR TODAY
customer_reviews.text: MY Last Seiko solar lasted from 2011 to 2019, so i bought a similar Seiko solar. It is very disappointing. I put it under a light which i never had to do with the other watch. More later.
customer_reviews.author: timetraveler02138

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Mu husband gave this to me as a birthday present recently and I absolutely love it! It came precharged so all I had to do was set the time, day and date. I live in Florida so recharging should never be a problem. The watch is comfortable, and very easy to read. I did have to have a jewler removed 6 links as I have a very small wrist. I look forward to owning and using this watch for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: Power Storage Does Not Last After a few Years
customer_reviews.text: Great time piece. But, after a few years you can leave this in direct sunlight and the charge will fail after one day.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Works great, the solar is convient ie no more battery replacment.
customer_reviews.text: Identical to the previous Seiko except solar powered. The reciepent of this watch likes it!
customer_reviews.author: arthurbtx

customer_reviews.title: Huh?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I'm going to keep this watch. The day and date are so tiny - my 60 year old eyes could barely see them! When I used a magnifying glass, I saw that the days of the week are in Spanish AND English. Don't need both, however the watch itself is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JayBee

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: As usual, the band was extra large. Took a lot of time watching you tube videos to learn how to take the links out. But feat was accomplished and I love the watch!
customer_reviews.author: L M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves her watch. Only draw back is when not worn it needs to be left in the light. She leaves it in the bathroom and not getting any light it dies. Beatiful as usual from Seiko.
customer_reviews.author: lynn bowers

customer_reviews.title: Good Bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The day and date are rather small. The dial turned to February 29th this year when the correct date was March 1 but you can't have everything in a watch that cost less than a $100.
customer_reviews.author: Bummer 2

customer_reviews.title: Great All Around Watch
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my new Seiko solar watch. It was very easy to set up and my jeweler adjusted the band so it fits perfectly. It is comfortable to wear and easy to read. It has a nice look for both casual and dressy occasions. Great all around watch. Good for the environment as well. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M.

customer_reviews.title: seems great
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this watch a week but so far I am very pleased. It charged right up, is easy to read, I had to have a few links taken out of the band, but that's no big deal. It looks nice and I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: LO Shallot

customer_reviews.title: I really love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I really love this watch. The links in the bracelet came out easily. Easy to set date and day. The fact that I never need to put a battery in it is what attracted me in the first place. This watch is very accurate. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Teri Staab

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love my Seiko watch because the black numbers around the dial are easy to see. Since I retired from teaching, I struggle to remember the day of the week. The Seiko display includes this option though I may have to use a magnifier to see it. My husband removed 5 links on the band and it fits my 6 1/4 inch diameter wrist snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: Hesitant to buy on line but I was able to get the band adjusted for only 5$. Nice watch and a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: bustertoad

customer_reviews.title: Solar charge.  Very nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: Solar. Very nice-looking watch. clear numbers and second hand. I did not realize the battery is charged by light when I bought it, but that is OK. I bought it as a gift and will be sure to tell the recipient.
customer_reviews.author: SarahPsych

customer_reviews.title: Watch does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this from Amazon. Watch stopped after a few hours. Sent it back a few weeks after purchase through Amazon to certified repair shop. Came back and had same problem after a few weeks. This watch is JUNK and neither Seiko nor Amazon will remedy the situation. Shameful behavior by both companies. Amazon just refunded purchase. Five stars to Amazon. Zero to Seiko!
customer_reviews.author: john dale

customer_reviews.title: Don't Store In Box
customer_reviews.text: The numbers on the face are large and easy to read. It's my first solar watch so here's a tip from the jeweler who adjusted the band - don't leave it in the box or in a drawer as that may hurt the solar mechanism over time. If not wearing it for a period of time, it's best to leave it on a table or a place where it will always receive light.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: i like this watch very much
customer_reviews.text: i like this watch very much. The clasp is easy, I like that it is gold and silver to match everything, I like the large numbers and the day and date. Fits all my needs. The only thing I might like better is if the face was black and the numbers were gold.
customer_reviews.author: almarza

product_meta.title: Seiko Women's SUT116 Stainless Steel Two-Tone Watch
product_meta.description:
From Humble beginnings, Kintaro Hattori’s Vision for Seiko has become reality. A consuming passion for excellence - imprinted in our Corporate DNA passed from generation to generation. Seiko, for 125 years committed to the art and science of time.

 A culture of innovation connects a 19th century Tokyo clock shop with 20th century advances in timekeeping to an extraordinary 21st century "quiet revolution." Continually driven by dedication and passion, established a multitude of world’s first technologies… transforming the principles of timekeeping. 

 The first quartz wristwatch – changed the history of time. 

 The first Kinetic – marked a new era in quartz watch technology. 

 In 1969, Seiko Astron, the first quartz wristwatch - was introduced. 

 In an instant, Seiko exponentially improved the accuracy of wristwatches –And Seiko technology firmly established today’s standard in Olympic and sports timing. 

 1984, another celebrated first – Kinetic Technology – powered by body movement. 

 Kinetic – a quartz mechanism with unparalleled accuracy –the driving force behind more world’s firsts. 

 Kinetic Chronograph – the next generation of high performance timekeeping. 

 Kinetic Auto Relay – automatically resets to the correct time. 

 Kinetic Perpetual - combining the date perfect technology of perpetual calendar with the genius of Kinetic Auto Relay. 

 And now Kinetic Direct Drive – move, and the watch is powered automatically. Or hand wind it and see the power you are generating in real time. 

 In the realm of fine watches, time is measured by Seiko innovation – A heritage of dedication to the art and science of time.



Seiko Solar. No battery change required and powered by all types of light. Solar cell with high performance electricity generation. Energy-efficient movement with long power reserve. This modern ladies' dress watch is designed with a two-tone stainless steel case and bracelet and white dial. Day/date calendar. 30 meters water resistant.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * User Manual Manual [PDF ] 
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :6 x 6 x 6 inches; 8.01 Ounces
 * Item model number :SUT116
 * Department :Female
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :September 6, 2013
 * Manufacturer :Seiko
 * ASIN :B00F0TSL2A
 * 
 * Domestic Shipping:Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
 * International Shipping:This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #48,410 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #23423 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #104 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars875 ratings
